degrees.description: Dissertation focused on machine learning applications in medical imaging. Research involved developing novel deep learning architectures for automated diagnosis from radiological images.
Specialized in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Thesis on natural language processing for electronic health records.
achievements: Teaching assistant for undergraduate AI course
Best student paper award at NLP conference

degrees.description: Focus on signal processing and computer systems. Senior project on biomedical signal analysis.
achievements: Ranked in top 5% of graduating class
